name: BlackWhite (Kinkelin)
description:
In this fast duelist game two players can measure their skill in front of one PC.

With punches, lasers or precise landings you can make your opponents  health bar disappear. But be careful - your opponent can dodge your attack with dashes or bock them with a shield.

This minimalist game was created as part of the #gppcc16 Game jam/challenge by German youtuber LetsGameDev.
